name: Polar Wars: South Pole In Peril
blurb: The South Pole Needs You for the Penguin Guard! Help save the South Pole in this 3d action/puzzle game for iPhone and mobile devices.

rewards.reward: Our deepest appreciation in the form of a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic you can share with family and friends and a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button.

Polar Wars Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; our deepest appreciation in the form of a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic and a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button.
Your Name in the credits as a Supporter; Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic; and a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button.
Your Name in the credits as a Premier Supporter; Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic, and a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button.

An autographed Polar Wars Full-Color Poster (11x17 in.)  PLUS:  Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic; a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Premier Supporter

A White T-shirt featuring a \u201cPenguin Aviator\u201d. PLUS: Full-Color Poster (11x17 in.) signed by the creator; Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic, a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Premier Supporter

Black T-Shirt Featuring \u201cGeneral Snare, Hero of the Battle of Cape Horn\u201d.  PLUS: the 11x17 in. poster signed by the creator; Exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic, a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Premier Supporter

Black Baseball Cap with Polar Wars logo and a White T-Shirt (Penguin Aviator) PLUS:  the 11x17 in. poster signed by the creator; exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic, a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Funder.

Black baseball cap with Polar Wars logo and Black T-Shirt Featuring \u201cGeneral Snare\u201d; the 11x17 in. poster signed by the creator; exclusive HD Desktop Background Image, a special video \u201cThank You\u201d from the Pen Gwyn Republic, a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Funder.

Black baseball cap with Polar Wars logo, White Penguin Aviator T-shirt, and Black T-Shirt Featuring \u201cGeneral Snare\u201d. PLUS: a 11x17 in. poster signed by the creator; exclusive HD Desktop Background Image; a special, personalized  \u201cThank You\u201d video from General Snare to YOU, a \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d button, and your name in the credits as a Premier Funder.

Special Executive Producer Gifts:  Two Black baseball caps with Polar Wars logo, Two White Penguin Aviator T-shirts, Two Black T-Shirts Featuring \u201cGeneral Snare\u201d; Two different 11x17 in. posters signed by the creator, HD Desktop Background Image, a special, personalized  \u201cThank You\u201d video from General Snare to YOU, Two \u201cSave the South Pole\u201d buttons, and your name in the credits as an Executive Producer.
